actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to return to the cost-based regulation of wholesale interstate sales of electricity, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to regulate rates and charges for (wholesale interstate) electric energy sales within its jurisdiction on the same (cost) basis as they were regulated prior to issuance of specified FERC orders on April 24, 1996.

titles.title: To require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to return to the cost-based regulation of wholesale interstate sales of electricity, and for other purposes.
